00044 void EunetTerminals::assignAddresses(const char* network_address,
00045                 const char* netmask) {
00046         ns3::Ipv4Address ipv4_address(network_address);
00047         ns3::Ipv4Mask ipv4_mask(netmask);
00048         ns3::Ipv4AddressHelper ipv4_address_helper(ipv4_address, ipv4_mask);
00049         this->assignAddresses(ipv4_address_helper);
00050 }//assignAddresses
00051 
00052 void EunetTerminals::assignAddresses(
00053                 ns3::Ipv4AddressHelper& ipv4_address_helper) {
00054         for (unsigned i = 0; i < this->GetN(); ++i) {
00055                 NS_ASSERT(this->Get(i)-> GetNDevices()==2);
00056                 this->Get(i)->assignAddress(ipv4_address_helper);
00057         }//for
00058 }//assignAddresses

00064 ns3::Ptr<EunetTerminal> EunetTerminals::Get(const int i_eunet_terminal) {
00065         auto ptr = Base::Get(i_eunet_terminal)->GetObject<EunetTerminal> ();
00066         NS_ASSERT(ptr->GetNDevices()==2);
00067         return ptr;
00068 }

00070 ns3::NetDeviceContainer EunetTerminals::getDevicesAll() {
00071         ns3::NetDeviceContainer net_device_container;
00072         for (unsigned i = 0; i < this->GetN(); ++i) {
00073                 //auto ptr_eunet_terminal = getEunetTerminal(i);
00074                 //NS_ASSERT(ptr_eunet_terminal->GetNDevices()==1);
00075                 //auto ptr_net_device = ptr_eunet_terminal->GetDevice(0);
00076                 net_device_container.Add(this->Get(i)->getCsmaNetDevice());
00077         }//for
00078         return net_device_container;
00079 }//getDevicesAll

00081 void EunetTerminals::logTotalRx(ns3::LogLevel log_level) {
00082         for (auto i = this->Begin(); i != this->End(); ++i) {
00083                 (*i)->GetObject<EunetTerminal> ()-> logTotalRx(log_level);
00084         }
00085 }

00087 void EunetTerminals::bringAtoB(const unsigned i_eunet_terminal_a,
00088                 const unsigned i_eunet_terminal_b) {
00089         NS_ASSERT(i_eunet_terminal_a < this->GetN());
00090         NS_ASSERT(i_eunet_terminal_b < this->GetN());
00091 
00092         NS_LOG_INFO("getting terminal " << i_eunet_terminal_a << " of " << this->GetN());
00093         auto a = this->Get(i_eunet_terminal_a);
00094         NS_LOG_INFO("getting terminal " << i_eunet_terminal_b << " of " << this->GetN());
00095         auto b = this->Get(i_eunet_terminal_b);
00096         NS_LOG_INFO("bringing node " << a->GetId() << " into CSMA domain of node " << b->GetId());
00097         b->bring(a);
00098 }
00099 
00100 void EunetTerminals::setRemoteOfAtoB(const unsigned i_eunet_terminal_a,
00101                 const unsigned i_eunet_terminal_b) {
00102         auto a = this->Get(i_eunet_terminal_a);
00103         auto b = this->Get(i_eunet_terminal_b);
00104         a->setRemote(b);
00105 }
